title: Planetarium App Design: Case Study
description: The Planetarium App Design was made in collaboration with the Porto Planetarium. The goal of the project was to create an app design for an official Planetarium App that would improve the visitor experience. The prototype can be tested in: https://bit.ly/3Dafni7

images.title: Login and Calender
images.description: The user can login to the app and check the calender and Planetarium events.

images.title: Quiz
images.description: The user can use the app to participate in Planetarium sessions, through a quiz like form.

images.title: Audio and History
images.description: The user can listen to the audio guide through the QR Codes as well as check historical information about the Planetarium.

title: Match App Design
description: This project was in collaboration with the Construction Institute from University of Porto. The client needed an application where professionals could login and register building data according to the norms of Heritage Assessment. The App also needed to allow searching for building data, finding and adding building locations and other useful functionalities. The prototype can be tested in: https://bit.ly/3DAmB0j

title: ECOSPOTS
description: This project's goal was to make sustainability more attractive to people. To do this, ECOSPOTS treats each good action towards the environment as a kind of game elements. Each time you do a good action, you get points. The user can then have friends and compare their points, bringing a competitive element to sustainable actions. The prototype can be tested in: https://bit.ly/3zh7Ah6

title: SCOUT WEBSITE REDESIGN
description: This project's goal was to make sustainability more attractive to people. To do this, ECOSPOTS treats each good action towards the environment as a kind of game elements. Each time you do a good action, you get points. The user can then have friends and compare their points, bringing a competitive element to sustainable actions. The prototype can be tested in: https://bit.ly/3zh7Ah6

title: Scale of the Dead
description: This was a game made for a Digital Games class in collaboration with some colleagues. My part of this work was mainly focused on development, level design and documentation.

title: The Joke | Interactive Website
description: In this project we had to represent a short story making use of multimedia technologies. We chose to create an interactive website about The Joke, a short story by Anton Checkov. Our concept was to explore the story and mix it with a bit of research about the author, so we can see the story being written on the side as well as SVG animations and illustrations about it but this is mixed with written notes and pictures about Checkov's life and society context.

title: Design, Art and Technology Conference Identity
description: This was a project made in the scope of a course about visual identities, the first branding project I ever made. It was in collaboration with Maria Soares. The briefing included creating a branding for the DAT(Design, Art and Technology) conference, which should include a website and posters.
tools: PROCESSING | P5.JS | BOOTSTRAP | JAVASCRIPT | HTML | CSS

title: Tipos e Totós: Online Course Design
description: This was a project made in the scope of a course about visual identities, the first branding project I ever made. It was in collaboration with Maria Soares. The briefing included creating a branding for the DAT(Design, Art and Technology) conference, which should include a website and posters.
tools: FIGMA | GOOGLE CLASSROOM | ADOBE PREMIERE PRO

title: 2020 Surviving a Pandemic
description: This was a game made in the earlier stages of the pandemic, for a Digital Games class. It is a 2D platformer game that intends to joke a little bit about the pandemic situation.
category: GAME ART, GAME DEVELOPMENT, LEVEL DESIGN

title: Promotional Video | Existências
description: This project was made for the association Existências, an association that supports people with drug addictions. This association needed a promotional video that would show what they actually do and how they try to give a better life and minimize risks for people with drug addictions without them having to stop taking drugs.

title: Illustrations
description: This project is a gathering of some illustrations made around the theme of flowers (a very common theme for me, I love flowers and drawing them), with some added other elements. All the drawings were made in Adobe Illustrator.

title: Soup Festival (Festival das Sopas)
description: This was a freelance project made for the Soup Festival in Figueira de Lorvão. The briefing included the need for posters and social media posts. The identity uses warm colors to relate to the warmth of soup and a fun and think font to appeal to the festival side and to improve visibility. This project was made using Adobe Illustrator, Premiere Pro and After Effects.
tools: ADOBE ILLUSTRATOR | ADOBE AFTER EFFECTS | ADOBE PREMIERE PRO

title: Music Taste Visualizer
description: This project was made for a Project class in the last year of my Bachelor's degree, it was made in collaboration with Maria Soares and Maria Figueira. In this project we were given freedom to create any interactive multimedia artifact, we chose to create a website that would make people closer through music. This project is a multiuser website that uses the Spotify API so that the users can enter and add/remove visual representations of their favorite songs, their favorite playlists and favorite artists. This creates an online artboard filled with several user's favorite music. At the end of the project, UX/UI user testing was done and we received good results.
tools: SPOTIFY API | P5.JS | JAVASCRIPT | HTML | CSS

title: The Bucket Rider Animation
description: For this project we had to chose a short story to animate. Me and my colleague Maria Figueira chose The Bucket Rider by Franz Kafka.
category: MOTION DESIGN, VIDEO FRAME BY FRAME
tools: ADOBE AFTER EFFECTS | ADOBE PREMIERE PRO

title: Wedding Guide
description: This was a freelance project made for a wedding. The briefing included the need for a flyer or editorial element with the steps of the wedding ceremony. There were no specific requirements just that it should be elegant and simple. I drawed a rose for the cover and a rose stem for the back and the rest of the work was mainly typographical. This project was made using Adobe In Design.

title: Stanley Morrison Flyer
description: This was a project made for a Typography class where we had to make a flyer that showed information about a Typographer and their most famous font. My flyer is about Stanley Morrison, the creator of Times New Roman. The front of the flyer has all the information and the back has big poster.

title: Self Portrait
description: This was a project made for a Photography class where we had to present a self portrait. The overall look of the pictures is dark because the goal is to show the not so happy parts of me. Each gesture in a away shows an insecurity or dilemma.

title: What is Happiness?
description: This was a project made for a Design class where we had to illustrate what is happiness and of course my brain went immediately to food.

title: Apropriation | Duane Michals
description: This was a project made for a Photography class where we had to chose some of our favorite photographers and create images based on there works. These should include exact copies and adaptations. In the case of Duane Michals I chose to create two exact copies.
tools: CANON M50 | ADOBE PHOTOSHOP | ADOBE LIGHTROOM

title: Apropriation | Gregory Crewdson
description: This was a project made for a Photography class where we had to chose some of our favorite photographers and create images based on there works. These should include exact copies and adaptations. Gregory Crewdson is one of my most favorite photographers, so I chose him to work on. I tried to create one exact copy, the picture in the cover and two inspired photos.

title: Poster for Tomorrow
description: These posters were made for the contest Poster for Tomorrow, in the scope of a class. The goal was to make posters that would alert to the environmental crisis.

title: Koi Fish | First 3D Project
description: My first 3D project was done for a class, we had to create any short animated scene in 3D. I chose to do two koi fish swiming around the moon's reflection, inspired in a scene from Avatar: The Last Airbender.
